name: Disposed (Games Academy)
description:
Dies ist ein Projekt welche im Rahmen der Projektarbeit der Games Academy innerhalb von 8 Wochen erstellt wurde.

Vision Statement

Disposed is a single player first person game set in a retro sci-fi spaceship created in unreal 4. You play Robert, a janitor in training on a Starlink Spaceship and your task is to clean up. To do so you have a Gravity Stimulatur to help you dispose toxic barrels.

Key Facts

Camera: First Person

Engine: Unreal Engine 4

Genre: Adventure

Filmgenre: Sci-Fi

USP: Gravity Stimulator

Target Audience: 18-30 Year old Sci-Fi Fans

Controls: Keyboard and Mouse

Core Gameplay

Robert has to pass a janitor training test by disposing hazardous barrels. To his aid, he has the Gravity Stimulator which can pick up any loose object on the ship so they can be transported save and with ease. Using this trusty tool he has to take the barrels and put them in a waste disposal shaft, as soon as all are gone Robert may proceed into another room and repeat his task, yet getting to the barrels gets harder as he progresses. If he cleared every room he has passed his test.
